document.full_text: israel believes turkey is actively helping iran to sidestep economic sanctions and has also turned a blind eye to iranian weapons smuggling into syria, according to leaked u.s. diplomatic cables published on friday.
document.title: turkey helps iran avoid sanctions -israel tells u.s.: cables
lines_and_colors: israel believes turkey is actively helping iran to sidestep economic sanctions and has also turned a blind eye to iranian weapons smuggling into syria, according to leaked u.s. diplomatic cables published on friday.
